message: Starting code quality review of cleanup implementation. Will examine cleanup_agent_resources(), kill_real_agent(), and file tracking mechanisms.
Read cleanup_agent_resources (lines 3940-4134), kill_real_agent integration (3878-3883), and deploy tracking (2417-2423). Now conducting detailed analysis of issues and quality concerns.
Identified 3 critical/high issues: file handle leak, race condition, error handling weakness. Continuing deeper analysis of edge cases, thread safety, and performance.
Found 6 issues (1 critical, 2 high, 3 medium). Now checking positive aspects, security considerations, and preparing final quality assessment document.

Code quality review complete. Created comprehensive 8200-word analysis document with: 7 issues found (1 critical, 2 high, 4 medium/low), overall quality score 6.5/10, security assessment, testing recommendations, and prioritized fix roadmap. Verdict: NOT PRODUCTION READY - 3 critical fixes required before deployment.
